Paulo Boschcov

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/2406357623593629
  • Última atualização do currículo em 15/01/2018

Paulo Boschcov (PB) completed the course of Biological Sciences (medical modality; 1973), and obtained his MSc (1976) and PhD (1981) degrees in Molecular Biology (UNIFESP, EPM, Dep. of Biophysics). || During his graduate studies, PB was approved for the position of teaching assistant (UNIFESP, EPM, Dep. of Biophysics, 1975). While PB taught Biophysics and Physical Chemistry classes to undergraduate students (medical, biomedical, and nursing courses), he also collaborated in several projects related to the biochemistry of biologically-active peptides and enzymes of the renin-angiotensin system. He also worked on chemical synthesis and chromatographic purification of such peptides. || His postdoctoral studies were conducted at Universidade de São Paulo, USP (Instituto de Medicina Tropical, IMT, Sorologia, 1999-2000; and Instituto de Ciências Biomédicas, ICB4, Dep. of Immunology, 2001-2003). At USP, he collaborated on projects in the area of applied Immunology, with focus on oxidized Low-Density Lipoprotein (LDL) and atherosclerosis. There, he also taught post-graduate students the principles of analytical and preparative HPLC of peptides. || In 2008, PB retired from Unifesp to work as a scientific editor and translator at BRIDGE Textos Técnicos . Since 2013, PB has been the managing editor of BRIDGE, which provides editing and translation services as well as scientific writing courses to the scientific community. || For additional information, please open this document and go to "Other relevant information". (Texto informado pelo autor)

Outras informações relevantes

 
Paulo Boschcov (PB) has worked as a freelance translator (2005-2008), part-time translator and editor (2008-2012), and full-time managing editor (2012-) at BRIDGE Textos Técnicos. His services have been increasingly indicated by Brazilian Journal editors, and 
various scientists have acknowledged his contribution to improve the quality of scientific writing in their manuscripts . || In the period 2009-2012, PB also coordinated the activities of the Institutional Committee for [Correct Disposal of] Biological and Chemical Wastes at UNIFESP, campus of São Paulo . || For other information, please find PB's profile at Linkedin .
